block_comment: This block of Verilog code implements a register that stores the destination register number in an instruction execution pipeline. On a positive edge of the clock signal or on a negative edge of the reset signal, it updates the contents of 'R_dst_regnum'. If 'reset_n' is 0 (indicating a reset state), it initializes 'R_dst_regnum' to 0. Otherwise, it assigns the value of 'D_dst_regnum' to 'R_dst_regnum'.
